description.value:
Your battle instincts make you more aware of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} opponents. You don't need to succeed at a flat check to target concealed creatures. You're not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to creatures that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you (unless you're off-guard to them for reasons other than the hidden condition), and you need only a successful @Check[flat|showDC:all|dc:5] to target a hidden creature.

While you're adjacent to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creature of your level or lower, it is instead only hidden from you.
